name: Fruit Candy Bar
description:
Hello World I am your chef Gordon! I welcome you to fruit candy bar where I will be serving you with all the great juicy fruits. Order me and I will serve you the tasty treats.

Chef Gordon is best known for his best delicacies. Come and lets enjoy playing this super fun game of Fruit Candy.

Welcome to the yummy match –three puzzle of all the juicy fruit where we are serving real juice for super entertainment.

Fruit candy bar is a brand new game which brings a new way of match-3 fun in Candy fruits.
Join Gordon and the most eligible chef in the land and serve Mr, Brown, Charlie, Fred and Jolly with dream treats.
Make tasty treats of sugary sweet juicy fruits in this sweet puzzle journey and help Chef Gordon to serve Mr, Brown, Charlie, Fred and Jolly. You may feel hunger and carving while playing.

The Demand for fruit candy in each level is variable with exciting puzzle adventure.
Swipe and match as many candy fruits and make a sweet chain reaction

Game Features:
• Enjoy the adventure journey with sugary sweet fruit candy.
• Brand new match 3 fun with Chef Gordon and customers like Mr, Brown, Charlie, Fred and Jolly.
• Well designed sweet puzzle levels for match 3 fun.
• Great graphics works on effects like thunder, explosion , 4 in a row and many others.
• Share and compare your score with Facebook friends.
• Juicy and delicious levels.

How to play:
• Swap or swipe to make match 3 or more juicy an tasty treats.
• Match 4 is a line to create thunder fruit.
• Match 5 of L or T Shape to create the juicy bomb.
• Match 5 is a line to create whirlpool candy.
• Swap 2 power boosters to surprise Chef with juice Jam.

Game Modes:
Simple Mode: Match 3 or more fruit candy and achieve the targets

Time Mode: Make a match 3 with fruit swipe and eliminate all the obstacles to move ahead in the game

Ice Cream Mode: Ice creams are hidden in the game board. Find all the ice cream and collect it by swiping fruits over them

Cookie Mode: This is a very interesting mode of bringing tasty and crazy cookies down in the game. You can bring cookies down easily with the help of thunder fruit booster

Wafers Mode: Remove all the wafer jam from the game board to serve Mr, Brown, Charlie, Fred and Jolly. Wafers jam can be 3 layered to make this game more interesting.

Ice Hurdle: Fruits are caged in hollow ice cubes. Remove ice from the game to get free of the icy world.

Digger escape: Make the digger cross the juice jam and move from left to right.
Power Boosters:
Fruit thunder: To remove single row or column
Fruit Bomb: To explode and remove hurdles and eliminate some fruits from the area.

Whirlpool candy: Whirlpool candy is very powerful, if matched to any specific fruit then all those similar fruits gets removed from the board.
